NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
CASSAVA: I'm thrilled to lend my assistance in testing your new projection stone, Daz!
2
1
CASSAVA: To start: please let me know if you can read this message on the wall.
3
2
DAZ: I read you bright and clear, my love!
4
3
DAZ: Now, for the moment of truth! Will I be able to walk beyond the projection pool?
5
4
CASSAVA: Daz? Did something interrupt your thought? Your voyager has just disappeared..
6
4
CASSAVA: Daz, do you still read me? Daz..?
Cove R3 5
